summary:
Ever got tired of them big cats bobbing around like big idiots?
Ever thought to yourself: damnit talos im the dragonborn why cant my cat companion behave like a normal cat instead of derping around? 
if you have this mod is for you !
descriptionHtml:
[heading]Description[/heading]
Ever got tired of them big cats bobbing around like big idiots?
Ever thought to yourself: damnit talos im the dragonborn why cant my cat companion behave like a normal cat instead of derping around? 
with this mod the cat stands still and takes a deep breath.


[youtube]jPc7d3p51VQ[/youtube]

this is a workover of this mod : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45542/?
replaces the vanilla sabrecat idle with this animimation
for now only the idle animation*
doesnt look very fancy but should be good enough
remember the mod author has no idea what hes doing

-----------------
install to 
Data\meshes\actors\sabrecat\animations\mt_idle.hkx
-----------------

*due to various requests i consider fixing the other two bobbing animations as well
i wont promise anything though nor can tell you an exact date please understand

[heading]Credits and Permission[/heading]
Full Credit to xp32 for support and troubleshooting
Permission: Do whatever you like
author: testiger2
